data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'PO List'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_PO_LIST
as select from ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_PO_LIST_BASE as Base
  association to parent ZI_NFT_DDL_IMPORT_SHIPMENT as _Shipment on $projection.CompanyCode = _Shipment.CompanyCode
{
  key Base.CompanyCode,
  key Base.PurchaseOrder,
  key Base.PurchaseOrderItem,
      Base.PurchaseOrderType,
      Base.IncotermsClassification,
      Base.IncotermsTransferLocation,
      Base.PaymentTerms,
      Base.loekz,
      Base.IsStatisticalItem,
      Base.PurchasingOrganization,
      Base.PurchasingGroup,
      Base.PurchaseOrderDate,
      Base.Supplier,
      Base.SupplierName,
      Base.CreatedByUser,
      Base.erdat,
      Base.Plant,
      Base.StorageLocation,
      Base.attyp,
      Base.ManufacturerMaterial,
      Base.MaterialGroup,
      Base.MaterialGroupText,
      Base.mtart,
      Base.SupplierMaterialNumber,
      Base.Material,
      Base.MaterialText,
      Base.Batch,
      Base.ScheduleLineDeliveryDate,
      Base.AccountAssignmentCategory,
      Base.ConsumptionPosting,
      Base.OrderItemQtyToBaseQtyDnmntr,
      Base.OrderItemQtyToBaseQtyNmrtr,
      Base.GoodsReceiptIsExpected,
      Base.OverdelivTolrtdLmtRatioInPct,
      Base.UnderdelivTolrtdLmtRatioInPct,
      Base.UnlimitedOverdeliveryIsAllowed,
      Base.StockType,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit'
      Base.OrderQuantity,      
      Base.PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit,
      Base.mara_meins,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      Base.NetPriceAmount,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'OrderPriceUnit'
      Base.NetPriceQuantity,
      Base.OrderPriceUnit,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      Base.NetAmount,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      Base.GrossAmount,
      Base.DocumentCurrency,
      Base.SalesOrder,
      Base.SalesOrderItem,
      Base.WBSElementInternalID_2,

      Base.ReleaseIsNotCompleted, 
      Base.PurchasingCompletenessStatus,
      Base.PurchasingDocumentDeletionCode, 
      Base.IsCompletelyDelivered,
      Base.InvoiceIsGoodsReceiptBased, 
      Base.SupplierConfirmationControlKey,   
      
      Base.referencedocument,
      Base.referencedocumentitem,
      Base.incentivedocument,
      Base.incentivedocumentitem,
      Base.controldocument,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit'
      Base.shipquantity,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'PurchaseOrderQuantityUnit'
      Base.shipquantity_max,      
//      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'Currency'
//      Base.netpr,
//      Base.peinh,
//      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'Currency'
//      Base.netwr,
//      Base.currency,
      Base.invoicedocument,
      Base.invoicedate,
      Base.gtipno,
      Base.mensei,
      _Shipment,
      _CustomFields
}
